name: Kung-Fu Master
overview: Martial arts experts and demons of every description are your obstacles in this fast paced video action thriller. Travel through the wizard's temple to rescue the fair maiden held captive. You must avoid demons along with dragons, snakes, and killer bees. Beware of weapon wielding henchmen and defeat each of the deadly guardians to advance to each of the five floors. Your only defence is your own martial arts skills.
